bill_title: limit nonresident political contributions under certain circumstances.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to limit nonresident political contributions under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No candidate for state-wide office or legislative office, nor the committee of any such candidate, may accept, in any calendar year, more than twenty-five percent of the candidate's or committee's total contributions from contributors who are not residents of the State of South Dakota, or from political party committees or political action committees not organized in the State of South Dakota. Section 2. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No political party committee or political action committee organized in the State of South Dakota may accept, in any calendar year, more than twenty-five percent of its total contributions from contributors who are not residents of, or organized in, the State of South Dakota. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to limit nonresident political contributions under certain circumstances. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No candidate for state-wide office or legislative office, nor the committee of any such candidate, may accept, in any calendar year, more than twenty-five percent of the candidate's or committee's total contributions from individual contributors who are not residents of the State of South Dakota, or from political party committees or political action committees not organized in the State of South Dakota. Section 2. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No political party committee or political action committee organized in the State of South Dakota may accept, in any calendar year, more than twenty-five percent of its total contributions from contributors who are not residents of, or organized in, the State of South Dakota. BILL HISTORY 1/19/00 First read in House and referred to State Affairs. H.J. 135 1/24/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/26/00 State Affairs Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 7, NAYS 5. H.J. 242
